title: Carrot Rye
description: Seeded rye bread covered with seeds, made with a grated carrot which keeps the bread deliciously moist.

title: Seeded Rye
description: Rye bread with 90% seeds and covered with cornflakes.

title: Chia Rye
description: Light rye bread covered with chia seeds and sunflower seeds.

title: Sourdough Loaf
description: Sourdough loaf with a slightly sour and squishy consistency made with Biga sourdough.

title: Olander Loaf
description: Wholegrain loaf made with Biga sourdough and a Nordic protein rich Olander wheat.

title: Wholegrain Ciabatta Baguette
description: Italian whole grain durum wheat baguette.

title: Cinnamon Swirl
description: Danish pastry swirl with cinnamon, marzipan, and vanilla custard.

title: Seasonal Fruit Skyr
description: Protein-rich and fat-free Skyr yogurt, berry compote, house granola and a little of honey.

title: Danish Roll with Cheese
description: One of our signature rolls (either Salt & Pepper, Skagen, or Olander Roll) served with butter and cheese.

title: Carrot Bun
description: A soft bun with fresh-grated carrot and sunflower seeds (sounds strange but tastes delicious!)

title: Potato Focaccia
description: Baked focaccia with potato, cheese, and rosemary.

title: Goat's Cheese Focaccia
description: Baked focaccia with goat cheese and grilled artichokes.

title: Vegetarian Stew
description: Seasonal vegetables in a rich tomato sauce served with a side of sliced Skagen bread.

title: Ham & Cheese Baguette
description: Hepburn's ham and Emmental cheese baguette with gherkin and mustard mayo.

title: Mackerel on Rye
description: Smoked mackerel and Jersey potato on carrot rye with red cabbage and tartar sauce.

title: Tiger Prawn Baguette
description: Tiger prawn and avocado baguette with Marie Rose sauce.
